title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Video-Enhanced Rubric-Based Assessments for Complex Skill Formation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners analyze and evaluate video-recorded complex problem-solving processes using video rubrics, identifying over 80% of core skill elements.
Learners assess peers’ practical task videos using video rubrics and provide at least three specific feedback points.
Learners improve practical task accuracy by 40% by creating self-directed learning plans and referencing video modeling examples.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
